Articles.Content: So I've been attempting to mod again in KSP; and I've tried to use Airplane Plus, BDArmory, BdArmoryWeaponExtenstion, Feline Utility Rovers, HyperEdit, Kerbal Planetary Base Systems, KSP Maritime Pack, MechJeb2,Near Future Propulsion, Near Future Solar, and OPT for version 1.3. I've been having a multitude of problems (mainly with the game becoming unresponsive or just closing before it finishes loading) which tend to not produce any crash log, which of course isn't very helpful. Any suggestions to help with this?

5 hours ago, Deconda said:

which tend to not produce any crash log

The game will always produce a log. The only thing it will not do without a crash is to make copies of those logs and to put the copies into a timestamped folder. That's why the sticky is telling you where the logs are.

Make sure your mods are actually compatible with 1.3.1, not just 1.3. And use the 64bit version of the game.

On ‎10‎/‎23‎/‎2017 at 2:14 AM, Harry Rhodan said:

The game will always produce a log. The only thing it will not do without a crash is to make copies of those logs and to put the copies into a timestamped folder. That's why the sticky is telling you where the logs are.

Make sure your mods are actually compatible with 1.3.1, not just 1.3. And use the 64bit version of the game.

Thanks a lot, (I don't know why I didn't think to try this) but running in 64 bit solved everything, I appreciate the help!
